description: Incorporate the flavour of slow-cooked pork into your burgers with this mouth-watering and easy pulled pork burger recipe.
name: Pulled Pork Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 650 g Woolworths COOK slow cooked pork ribs in a smokey BBQ sauce
450 g Woolworths American style coleslaw kit

recipeInstructions.text: Pull meat from ribs and toss through cooking juices. Top bun bases with burger sauce, coleslaw and pork, then top with bun lids and serve.
